[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”mountains2″ bottom_divider_color=”#669d35″ bottom_divider_height=”54px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ width=”100%”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.jacouleengineering.com//wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Site-Workers.jpg” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ filter_contrast=”130%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”150px” filter_saturate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_saturate__hover=”40%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_team_member name=”Manpower Services” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”51px” position_text_align=”center” background_color=”rgba(102,157,53,0.78)” custom_margin=”-26px|||-29vw|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px|||0vw|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||0vw|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”10px||10px||false|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” header_font_size_tablet=”45px” header_font_size_phone=”30px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”30px”][/et_pb_team_member][et_pb_team_member _builder_version=”4.2.1″ body_text_align=”justify” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” custom_margin=”1vw||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”2vw||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|25px|10px|25px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” hover_enabled=”0″]

We are a trusted Manpower Servicing Company, with over a decade of providing word-class recruitment and manpower management services to the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry. Our experience and well trained professional team has a clear understanding of Manpower recruitment, training and development.

JACOULE has handled Oil and Gas recruitment in the areas of Project Management, Construction, Facility Maintenance, Installation, Commissioning, Engineering and Process Design.

We support our clients with highly competent technical personnel, who go through a rigorous selection / vetting process and are available for either short or long term placements.

    [/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ inner_shadow=”on” fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#1a1d24″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#398532″ background_color_gradient_end=”#000000″ global_module=”6641″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_fullwidth_menu menu_id=”54″ submenu_direction=”upwards” fullwidth_menu=”on” active_link_color=”#7cda24″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ menu_font=”||||||||” menu_text_color=”#dbd5d4″ menu_line_height=”0.5em” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” menu_text_color_tablet=”#398532″ menu_text_color_phone=”#398532″ menu_text_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” menu_font_size_tablet=”13px” menu_font_size_phone=”11px” menu_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” active_link_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” active_link_color__hover=”#dbe9a5″][/et_pb_fullwidth_menu][/et_pb_section]
